Tender Description: The procurement and delivered implementation of a regional cloud based UTMC Common Database (CDB) provisioning the four existing UTC centres of West Yorkshire with a cooperative and connected end product.  This will replace existing locally implemented CDB's in Bradford, Kirklees and Leeds (IDOX and Mott Macdonald products respectively).  This is an open tender and tender documents can be viewed on the Yortender website using the Link given in this notice  - Yortender Contract Reference DN481226.
Classification Description: IT services: consulting, software development, Internet and support
